title.rendered: Bernard Jabbour. The Oriental Fashion Show. FW 22-23

content.rendered:
Bernard Jabbour. The Oriental Fashion Show. FW 22-23 

From Lebanon to Paris

Fashion designer and consultant, known for the innovative and avant-garde design of his extraordinarily inspired collections, his success grows season after season.

He is a consultant and mentor for famous TV programs such as Project Runway and Fashion Star Middle East, artistic director and stylist for Arab Idol, Star Academy and Miss Lebanon, leader of the MBC group TV channels, LBC, Dubai TV...

For Bernard Jabbour, a dress must tell a story, like a work of art painted on the womans body, it must be in perfect harmony with her image. Paying tribute to the eternal feminine beauty, Bernard Jabbour allows women to wear dresses that reflect their personality.

His workshop is the place where the fusion of the finest, most luxurious and fluid materials rhymes with creativity andcraftsmanship. Innovation and tradition are combined with excellence and creativity to offer a unique experience to a very demanding clientele.


By Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad
